page.title: 04TRANSPORT AND COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Every family in the Glen must have a{private car }so they can get out of the Glen to buy the messages etc. There is no{public transport}apart from the post bus. People can get a lift down to Kirriemuir in the morning with the postman in his van.It costs 50p. Unfortunately you can't get a lift back. Nearly all the houses in the Glen have{telephones.}Their number has no more than 3 digits.The numbers go up consequetivly because they were installed at the same time. In Glenprosen not all houses have{television.}The reason is because some houses can't get a signal.Some houses have television but can't get all the channels and some houses television pictures are snowy. {Newspapers}are delivered by post.
